name: The Grabherr Group
body:
**Below is a list of software developed and maintained by the Grabherr Group:**

***

[_**Sm√∂rgas Protein Aligner**_ ](http://grabherrgroup.github.io/Smorgas-proteins/): An Ultra Fast Aligner for Protein Sequences
***
[_**Satsuma**_ ](http://satsuma.sourceforge.net/): A Highly sensitive whole-genome synteny aligner
***
[_**Kraken**_ ](http://nedaz.github.io/kraken): A universal genomic coordinate translator for comparative genomics
***
Cola
***
